english_example_sentence: The little child was going to hit the ball hard, but he gave up.
russian_example_sentence: Маленький ребенок собирался сильно ударить по мячу, но передумал.
turkish_example_sentence: Küçük çocuk topa sert vuracaktı ama vazgeçti.
